front.title: Session Based Trivial Object Transfer and Exchange (TOTE)

abstract.t: This document defines a simple protocol - Trivial Object Transfer andExchange (TOTE) - that provides bidirectional exchange of MIMEobjects over a TCP connection. It is used in conjunction withprotocols based on the offer/answer model, such as the SessionInitiation Protocol (SIP). TOTE can be used for any applicationrequiring direct agent-to-agent data communication, such as pictureexchange or camera controls.
